body_html:
@victor-shepardson: We're not sure why but the binary protobuf wheel we build doesn't work for everyone and results in segfaults for some, but it does work for others.

You might need to figure out how to build the optimized python protobuf package on your own. Hopefully the github.com/google/protobuf folks can help.
body_text:
@victor-shepardson: We're not sure why but the binary protobuf wheel we build doesn't work for everyone and results in segfaults for some, but it does work for others.
You might need to figure out how to build the optimized python protobuf package on your own.  Hopefully the github.com/google/protobuf folks can help.
body:
@victor-shepardson: We're not sure why but the binary protobuf wheel we build doesn't work for everyone and results in segfaults for some, but it does work for others.

You might need to figure out how to build the optimized python protobuf package on your own.  Hopefully the github.com/google/protobuf folks can help.
